text: Aur jinka haal yeh hai ke agar kabhi koi fahash kaam unse sarzad ho jata hai ya kisi gunaah ka irtikaab karke woh apne upar zulm kar baithte hain to maâ€™an Allah unhein yaad aa jata hai aur ussey woh apne kasooron ki maafi chahte hain, kyunke Allah ke siwa aur kaun hai jo gunaah maaf kar sakta ho aur woh deedha o daanista(wilfully persist) apne kiye par israr nahin karte
